message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15,000.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product but my budget is around $10,000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I understand that $10,000 is your maximum budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm firm on my budget of $10,000. If you're not able to come down to that price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're firm on your budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'll go down to $12,000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
